name: IP_WORKLIST_COMP
description: This table provides information on completed work list tasks.

columns.name: TASK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the task record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMP_ON_TIME
columns.description: The instant a work list task was completed.

columns.name: SCHED_TIME
columns.description: The instant the work list task was scheduled.

columns.name: INSTANCE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The current instance status category ID for the task record.

columns.name: ANCHOR_SCHED_I_DTTM
columns.description: If this task was created from an anchored order, this is the due time of the anchor order related to this task due time

columns.name: NOTIFICATION_GRP_C_NAME
columns.description: The notification group category ID for the task.

columns.name: SCHED_TIME_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the work list task was scheduled in UTC.

columns.name: COMPLETED_IN_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the patient contact in which the task was completed. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: TASK_COMP_DATE
columns.description: The date the user indicates the task was completed

columns.name: OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description: The task outcome category ID for the task.

columns.name: REMOVED_IN_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the patient contact from which a user removed the task. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: UNCOMPLETED_IN_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the patient contact from which a user undid the completion action for the task. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: TASK_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the note record for the comment associated with a specific task instance.

columns.name: TASK_RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID
columns.description: The responsible user assigned to an instance of a care plan task.

columns.name: TASK_RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: TASK_RESPONSIBLE_IB_POOL_ID
columns.description: The responsible pool assigned to an instance of a care plan task.

columns.name: TASK_RESPONSIBLE_IB_POOL_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.
